/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the highway, providing a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the highway, lush green trees and bushes line the road, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The road itself is divided by a median, and on the right side, a large billboard stands tall, perhaps advertising a nearby business or event. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye towards the horizon. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the bustling city life of Beijing, juxtaposed with the tranquility of nature.
